mapper.update:
update video_record
enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
enterprise_name = #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
permission_id = #{permissionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
charger = #{charger,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area = #{area,jdbcType=INTEGER},
area_name = #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
record_picture1 = #{recordPicture1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
record_picture2 = #{recordPicture2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
record_person = #{recordPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
record_time = #{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
level = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
record_count = #{recordCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
record_content = #{recordContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
handle_content = #{handleContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
handle_person_id = #{handlePersonId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
handle_person_name = #{handlePersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
handle_time = #{handleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_ip = #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_time = #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update video_record set enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, enterprise_name = #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permission_id = #{permissionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, charger = #{charger,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area = #{area,jdbcType=INTEGER}, area_name = #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, record_picture1 = #{recordPicture1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, record_picture2 = #{recordPicture2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, record_person = #{recordPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, record_time = #{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, level = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, record_count = #{recordCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, record_content = #{recordContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, handle_content = #{handleContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, handle_person_id = #{handlePersonId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, handle_person_name = #{handlePersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, handle_time = #{handleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_ip = #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_time = #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) FROM video_record WHERE type =2
AND enterprise_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.enterpriseName},'%') AND area_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.areaName},'%')

SELECT FROM video_record WHERE type =2
AND enterprise_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.enterpriseName},'%') AND area_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.areaName},'%') order by id desc limit #{page.offset}, #{page.pageSize}

SELECT count(1) FROM (select a.*,b.name as area_name from (SELECT a.*,b.enterprise_name as enterprise_name,b.area as area, b.registered_address as address, b.id_number as permission_id,b.year_assessment as check_level, b.cantact_way as contact,b.cantacts as charger from (SELECT DISTINCT enterprise_id,count(1) as record_count FROM video_record where type =1 GROUP BY enterprise_id)as a left join supervision_enterprise as b on a.enterprise_id = b.id)as a left join sys_area as b on a.area = b.id) as a WHERE 1=1
AND a.enterprise_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.enterpriseName},'%') AND a.area_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.areaName},'%')
